translation: The Blessed Lord said, "There are threefold faiths inherent in the nature of the embodied: the sattvic (pure), the rajasic (passionate), and the tamasic (dark). Hear of them."
commentary: 17.2 Threefold threefold? becomes is? Shraddha faith? of the embodied? She that (faith)? Svabhavaja (is) inherent in (their) nature? Sattviki Sattvic (pure)? Rajasic Rajasic (passionate)? f and? Eve even? Tamasic Tamasic (dark)? f and? It is thus? Tam it? Hear hear (thou).Commentary The whole world is made up? as if there were? of faith. Faith assumes a threefold aspect under the influence of the three alities.
